member.name: DEVICE_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about a media sharing device.

member.name: DEVICE_INFO.pFriendlyDeviceName
member.summary: The friendly name of the device.

member.name: DEVICE_INFO.pUniqueDeviceName
member.summary: A string that uniquely identifies the device.

member.name: DEVICE_INFO.pIconURL
member.summary: The URL of an icon for the device.
